Name: Student Workbook for College Physics: A Strategic Approach Volume 1 (Chs. 1-16)

ReviewList.Text: This workbook is used to enable students to set up problems.  However, no hints or solutions are offered.  Without these hints/solutions, the book is totally useless!  Needless to say, I returned it.
This workbook was an extreme waste of paper.  Almost half the book contains blank "worksheets" which are needed for only some of the problems.

I had to buy this for my class and I really don't like that there is no solutions manual anywhere to be found or available. My professor is so useless and this book doesn't make it any easier. The textbook sucks also... DO. NOT. LIKE.
The workbook is useful for practicing the problems beyond required assignments, but your instructor will need to confirm the answers since there is no way to check.

I figured that since the book was "used" it would contain a lot of writing and that I'd have to cover up the answers written in by others. I bought this and the second volume from the same seller and they are literally like brand new! Took a few days to ship, and it's not like I'm looking forward to the class but I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality!
Surprised at how nice this book was for only one cent! Worked perfect (: definitely recommend for anyone taking physics! Answers not included.
It has everything that I need for the class and it breaks down problems in a way that are easy and make sense
This really helps solidify the concepts before tackling the more quantitative problems in the textbook.
Came as promised even quicker than expected.

This workbook was listed as being in "Very Good" Condition under the used section. And as a clarification, it even explicitly stated that there were no markings, highlighting, or any writing inside. To say the least, the company lied. There is writing inside the book. Lots of it. Not just in pencil, which will be an absolute pain to get rid of so I can use it, but there is also writing in pen and crayon. Being that this is a book for college, the seller has to understand the importance in a student like myself trying to save some money... not only that, but to at least give the buyer a chance to know what it is they're paying for by at least not advertising something to the TOTAL contrary. I've been buying my college books online for the past 2 years, and this purchase was, by far, the MOST DISAPPOINTING.
The product was as described. Although I wouldn't recommend this book as a helpful resource to learning the material, the product itself was fine.
I liked this product because it had all the pages I needed and also because it was clean for most parts
The book was in almost perfect condition. It didn't take long for the book to arrive which was good. I would probably purchase from this vendor again.
The book took awhile to get here but it came as described in pristine condition no defects what so ever! A+++++
